text: Girl Hunting (Persian: Shekare khanegi) is a 1951 Iranian comedy film directed by Sadegh Bahrami and Ali Daryabegi.Issari p.137 ==Cast== * Sadegh Bahrami * Asghar Tafakori == References == == Bibliography == * Mohammad Ali Issari. title: Girl Hunting
